title: Simple Chicken and Dumplings
ingredients: ['4 skinless chicken breast fillets - cut into strips', '4 chicken stock cubes', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 sprig fresh parsley, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'Dumplings', '250g plain flour', '1 egg', '120ml soured cream', '125ml chicken stock', '8 tablespoons cornflour, to thicken']
